name: The Seed (FanieG)
description:
My Entry for the SA Game Jam 2020 

48 Hour

Hobbyist Category

Team members:

Fanie Greyvenstein  (Mbombela) - Art (Sketchbook), Programming (Unity), SFX (Freesounds.com)

Edward van der Merwe (Cape Town) - Music (Cubase)

The Seed:

Our garden has been laid to waste by HIM and his minions.  Time to bring it back from the brink.  Use your trusty seed mines, to leave traps for the evil Weevils, and litter the landscape with new seedlings...then fertilize their roots with the blood of our enemies.  Return our garden to a majestic Forrest.  But beware, HE won't take it lying down.

Game for windows - played with keyboard and mouse: WASD for movement, Mouse for aim.  Right Mouse Button launches seed pods, Left Mouse Button to shoot. Avoid enemies to put up a good high score.  1 x  adult flower = 1 x point.

Enjoy!!!
